Name: Amplitude Inc
Description: Amplitude Inc is a premier product intelligence platform that enables organizations to analyze user behavior and optimize product performance, driving data-driven decision-making. Through its state-of-the-art analytics solutions, Amplitude enhances customer engagement and retention, supporting businesses in various industries to achieve sustainable growth. With a strong focus on continuous innovation and scalability, the company is well-positioned to address the dynamic needs of the digital analytics landscape, making it an essential partner for enterprises aiming to enhance customer experiences and operational efficiency.
Address: 201 THIRD STREET, SAN FRANCISCO, CA, UNITED STATES, 94103
